page.title: 08School Closing Down .....
page.content:
{High Green School closing down .....
Our teacher said this is the most {important letter}you will ever get from this school. When I got home we learnt{the school might be closed.}The council said that seeing as the school is in a bad state they will shut it down. We started a{'Save our School' campaign. Some children wrote letters, Emma wrote to the{Queen.}Her picture was in all the papers. I wrote to {Martin Flannery M.P.,}the{Chief {Education Officer}and{Prince Philip. Amanda wrote to{Jimmy Saville.}We did lots of things to help. We had discos and designed badges. My mum and me and our Peter paid a lot of money. I made a petition. The badges said{"Bite back {against Closure".}When we got our teeth badges we wore them a lot.
